title: Toot
alt: This is also one of only five identified situations in which a vuvuzela is actually appropriate.
transcript:
Cueball: I don't mean to toot my own horn, but I was first in my class at Caltech.Black Hat: Really? I don't mean to toot my own horn, but
BRAAAAAAP!
[Cueball falls backward as Black Hat sounds an air horn in his face.][A picture of an air horn.]
Air horns: Worth carrying around your entire life for those few perfect moments.
